@graph.name: CHROMEISTER chromosome comparison
@graph.description:
A workflow designed to compare chromosomes and study large-scale rearrangements using CHROMEISTER

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [From small to large-scale genome comparison](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/genome-annotation/tutorials/hpc-for-lsgc/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
